name: Speed Uber Gift
description:
SUG is a first person shooter, in which you play as Santa Claus. On your way to distribute the gifts to all the childrens in the world, you realize that some cities are not decorated enough.  Your goal is to decorate cities as quickly as possible with your garland thrower!

 
  • A 3D game in the spirit of christmas
  • Fun and fast controls 
  •  5 levels to cross
  • Use your garland thrower to decorate the levels
 

Game Programmers: Grégoire Pierillas, Julien Quentin and Antoine Esbelin

3D Artist: Alexandre Roblin and UI Artist: Alexandre Jonasz 

Game Designers: Quentin Chailleux, Paul Bourdeau, Remy Schlaeintzauer, Tom Becker

Musics/Sound design: Jean-Baptiste Mar

Producer: Guillaume Moge
